brasil.holidays: Brazilian national holidays, with the option of adding municipal holidays from several cities simultaneously.
brasil.map: Interactive map built based on SVGs from the IBGE geographic mesh API, it is possible to change the color scheme, minimum contrast and division of the map.

colors.palette: Palettes inspired by different sources, used in some places in the project, shown here with their customized icons.
colors.shades: Generator of tones between target colors, with the option of customizing the amount of intermediate tones and adding new target colors (by default the targets are black and white)
